ai-mil3.1.2:1.1_0: “Sir, how many Nāgas are you, sir?”
ai-mil3.1.2:1.3_0: “Venerable, who are you seven or seven days?”
ai-mil3.1.2:2.1_0: Now at that time Migāra’s mother had been unenveloped by the king’s embankments, and the water’s shadow.
ai-mil3.1.2:2.2_0: He then said to the king,
ai-mil3.1.2:2.3_0: “Great king, what is your shadow? What can you do?”
ai-mil3.1.2:2.4_0: “Sir, I’m not pleased by the king, but heirs in the shadom.”
ai-mil3.1.2:2.5_0: “In the same way, great king, the courtesan that I can’t roll on seven rains.”
ai-mil3.1.2:2.6_0: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing! It’s amazing! Those questions are unfinished with wisdom.”
